artifacts.name: Weird Ball
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: Reduces bullet damage when standing still. Each hit increases the weight of the ball by 0.2kg up to a maximum of 5kg.

artifacts.name: Weird Bolt
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: Only works while charged and has to be recharged during an anomaly to provide protection.

artifacts.name: Weird Flower
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: If a stalker sleeps with the flower equipped, they are more difficult for enemies and mutants to detect

artifacts.name: Weird Nut
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: Regeneration from healing consumables is substantially slower.

artifacts.name: Weird Pot
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: Significantly reduces hunger but all food and drink consumables are poisonous and cause negative status effects drunk, bleeding, and radiation.

artifacts.name: Weird Water
artifacts.description: One of the legendary 'Altered Items'.
artifacts.special_effect: If the stalker carries over 50kg, the drunk status effect is applied.
